message.body: not really hahaha how bout you?!
:( :( :( time heals! I'm pretty ok. Having a hard time being productive today
That's actually funny because I've been being so productive that it ruins my sleeping schedule.
When ever I procrastinate I only need to remember one thing. I'm an adult! I don't *need* to do shit!
When you are a child almost all choice gets stripped from you. You don't get to express your own preferences or only in trivial ways.
That's true. That does make me feel better, too!
You get sucked into this pit where you are forced to do things you get no say in and you typically get three responses. (Aggression, Passive Aggression,
broken acceptance) As a result of repeatiately being told what to do with no regard to your preferences, you usually become resentful about a lot more.
People are taught/conditioned into a habit of procrastination because the default setting for children is to learn about how the world works around them.
People just don't realize that once they are adults that they live by their preferences. Every thing is a "have to" because that's how society tells parents to
Nope, just taking a nap now that i know I can do whatever I want/prefer :)
Fuck yeah! You are making the world a better place by expressing your honest wants (as long as you respect the NAP) :) OH HA! N.A.P. and nap.
